hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  # Auto-format with ruff
  if command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    ruff format "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Run linting
    issues=$(ruff check "$file_path" 2>/dev/null | head -5 || true)
    if [ -n "$issues" ]; then
      echo "[Hook] Ruff issues in $file_path:" >&2
      echo "$issues" >&2
    fi
  fi
  
  # Type check with mypy if available
  if command -v mypy >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    type_issues=$(mypy "$file_path" --no-error-summary 2>/dev/null | head -3 || true)
    if [ -n "$type_issues" ] && ! echo "$type_issues" | grep -q "Success"; then
      echo "[Hook] Type issues:" >&2
      echo "$type_issues" >&2
    fi
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Auto-format and lint Python files with ruff, type check with mypy
